name: Water Surfer: Car Racing 3D
description:
Water Surfer: Car Racing 3D!!!
You will have been played cars road racing and city car racing games till now but water car floating race is a new idea of car racing. It is simply like water jetting and submarine racing games you will have a car and you have to drive it on the beach pass through the ocean and to achieve small targets to complete level. sea run real skiing bike racing challenge is here in the form of super cars racing.
Features:

Beautiful futuristic floating cars to drive in underwater.
Realistic underwater swimming car physics.
Extreme water surfer driving animations.
Detailed gameplay with immense sea beach for water driving.
Realistic 3D graphics with high speed water surfer car.
